{{Lang|'''Hu Tao'''|zh=胡桃|zh_rm=Hú Táo}} is a playable [[Pyro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the 77th Director of the [[Wangsheng Funeral Parlor]], located in [[Liyue Harbor]].
